hooks.command: bash -c 'file_path="$(jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty" <<< "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT")"; if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx|json|md|yml|yaml|java)$ ]]; then prettier --write "$file_path"; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(xml|pom)$ ]]; then prettier --write --plugin=@prettier/plugin-xml "$file_path"; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.py$ ]]; then ruff format "$file_path"; fi'
